711823f-a.title: Manhattan: 26th Street - 1st Avenue
711823f-a.text:
26th Street, south side, east from 431 East 26th Street, east of
First Avenue, with Bellevue Hospital buildings at the right.
July 24, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

1558143.title: East 26th Street - First Avenue
1558143.folder: East 26th Street - First Avenue, Manhattan, NY

707553f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 26th St. E.
707553f-a.text:
First Avenue, south from a point midwav between E. 27th and
26th Streets and across the latter. Individuals in the fore-
omound are avaitig an Avenue C. Bus at what is its northerly
terminus:Bellevue Hospital. The hospital is on the opposite
side of this thoroughfare anl does not appear, tho the clearance
to the south does. Note the gas holders across the roof of the
Cripnled Institute and the 23rd Street ''E;'' berd in the back-
gground.
Mav 8, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

707558f-b.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 26th St. E.
707558f-b.text:
First Ave., east side, south from East 31st Street and showing
extending from East 30th to 26th Streets, the Bellevue Hospital
Buildings. That in the foreground is the Psychiatric Clinic and
Building.
No. 2 of this set emphasises the foreground and shows the gasoline
station at the S.E. corner of East 31st Street and the garage at the
N.E. corner of East 30th Street.
May 8, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

707552f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 26th St. E.
707552f-a.text:
First Ave., west side, north from and including East 26th to, but not
including 27th Streets. Note the Empire State Building silhouetted across
the skyline.
May 25, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

707558f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 26th St. E.
707558f-a.text:
First Ave., east side, south from East 31st Street and showing
extending from East 30th to 26th Streets, the Bellevue Hospital
Buildings. That in the foreground is the Psychiatric Clinic and
Building.
No. 2 of this set emphasises the foreground and shows the gasoline
station at the S.E. corner of East 31st Street and the garage at the
N.E. corner of East 30th Street.
May 8, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

707551f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 26th St. E.
707551f-a.text:
First Ave., east side, south from and including East 26th Street and
showing in the foreground, construction of Bellevue Hospital Out Patient
BuildinE.
September 1O, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

711824f-a.title: Manhattan: 26th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
711824f-a.text:
408-414 East 26th Street, south side, east of First Ave. (right),
showing the two buildings of the University Medical College. This view
is westward and shows across the cleared corner (S.E.) a portion of
Bellevue Medical College. The latter being on the opposite of First
Ave., at the S.W. corner of East 26th Street.
September 1937.
George D. Chinn.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

711821f-a.title: Manhattan: 26th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
711821f-a.text:
East 26th Street, north side, east from a point east of First
Avenue, showing units of Bellevue Hospital. The 5 story structure
in the center is the Training School for Male Nurses beyond same.
At the water's edge is a ward building, while beyond same appears
structures on the Greenpoint (Brooklyn) side of the East River.
Note at the left the new P.W. A. constructed Administration Building.
May 8, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

711822f-a.title: Manhattan: 26th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
711822f-a.text:
East 26th Street, west across First Avenue, showing
features of this Eellevue Hospital sector. A unit of
this institution is at the right, the Out Patient Bldg.
Across the open corner on the left, appears the College
Bldg. In the background is the outstanding New York Life
Tnsurance Co. Bldg.
October 13, 1939
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
